# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to exceed your expectations. This exceptional item is valued at $12000 to us, reflecting its high quality, unique features, and the time and effort invested into its creation. Considering its outstanding attributes, we believe it would be a valuable addition to your collection or needs. We kindly invite you to consider purchasing this product at an exclusive offer price of $10000. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. We look forward to the possibility of serving you. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $10,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $10,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $8,000
